title: Jason Adle
body:
Hey there! You've reached my website. This is an update on my previous website and I hope you'll stick around.

This website was built using the [Fernfolio](https://github.com/tylerMRoderick/fernfolio-11ty-template) template, a super simple portfolio template built with [Eleventy](https://www.11ty.dev/) and [Decap CMS](https://www.netlifycms.org/).
